title: Flight 93 National Memorial: Management
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management             Management       The National Park Service works to ensure that the story of Flight 93 will be told for generations to come and that the crash site of Flight 93 is protected unimpaired in perpetuity. This goal can only be achieved through will the help of a dedicated group of partners. Explore the ongoing process of planning and managing a national memorial.         Chuck Wagner  Our Partners Establishing, building, and managing a national memorial takes the combined determination and actions of many individuals and groups. Learn about the efforts of our partners past and present.         George W. Bush Presidential Library  Laws & Policies Explore the memorial's enabling legislation, the Superintendent's Compendium, information on firearms policy, and more.        National Park Service  Park Planning Learn about the process of planning and designing the memorial. Explore the General Management Plan, the design, boundary and lands, planning archives, and more.
